attributes.action: If a claimant has an appointment for an ATOS WCA and ATOS can't keep the appointment, ATOS should let claimants know
attributes.additional_details:
If a claimant has to attend for a Work Capability Assessment by ATOS, if ATOS can't keep the appointment, they should let the claimant know in advance instead of when the claimant attends the centre to have the WCA.

We want the Government to act on the sham that it is ATOS.
